title: Increased income would increase price on graph

content.question: The diagram above shows the demand and supply curves for a normal good. The equilibrium price could rise from P1 to P2 if

choices.label: P2 were set as a legal maximum
the price of a complementary product increased
costs of production were substantially lowered

topic.text: 2.7: Market Disequilibrium and Changes in Equilibrium

skill.text: Skill 2.A: Using economic concepts, principles, or models, explain how a specific economic outcome occurs, or what action should be taken in order to achieve a specific economic outcome.
